name: Dagedar
description:
Each raceway is composed lanes that loop, drop, climb and bank - but also contain blocks, and gaps that will knock the player off their game. 100 basic DaGeDar balls to unlock and choose from. Each ball carries abilities of Acceleration, Top Speed, Defense and Attack. Single or Multi-Player game play. 2 balls are in play at a time. 50 fast and furious raceways. Typical race time is 2-3 min.

Features

• Collectables: Unlock and collect up to 100 DaGeDar racing balls, for collectable and trading fun!
• Unique Race Abilities: Each ball carries abilities of Acceleration, Top Speed, Defense and Attack modes.
